summary: This Amendment to the Cooperation Agreement, dated November 14, 2025, extends the Expiration Date from May 4, 2027, to June 30, 2027, and modifies the standstill provisions to adjust the beneficial ownership limit of Common Stock by the Act III Parties. The amendment also includes standard provisions regarding successors, governing law, counterparts, headings, severability, and confirms that other terms of the original agreement remain unchanged.
